scripts.build: npm run compile && cp -r src/vendor/* build && npx browserify build/index.js -o build/bundle.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run download && npm run copy:package.json && test -d dist || mkdir dist && cp -a src/public dist/ && cp build/bundle.js dist/public/ && cp -a build/server dist
scripts.download: mkdir -p dist/public && cd dist/public && test -f scrcpy-server.jar || npx wget https://github.com/NetrisTV/scrcpy/releases/download/v1.9-ws/scrcpy-server.jar
scripts.copy:package.json: node -e 'const f=`package.json`, d=`./dist`, j=require(`./${f}`); !fs.existsSync(d)&&fs.mkdirSync(d); const {name,version,description,author,license,dependencies,scripts}=j; const p={name, version, description,author,license,dependencies}; p.scripts={start: scripts[`dist:start`]};fs.writeFileSync(`${d}/${f}`, JSON.stringify(p, null, `  `))'
scripts.start: npm run dist && cd dist && npm start
